thread.title: Sunil Chhetri rues lack of preparation
thread.title_full: Sunil Chhetri rues lack of preparation - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Sunil Chhetri rues lack of preparation
text:
MUMBAI: That India will fly to Turkmenistan for their next Fifa World Cup qualifier without a single home training session dovetailed with the fact that he must wait till October 16 to make his Indian Super League (ISL) debut has left national football team captain Sunil Chhetri a frustrated man.
"If you ask me ideally what I would have wanted then I would have definitely wanted more days," Chhetri said on the preparations for Turkmenistan whom India play on October 8.
"I would have wanted to play the ISL game also. I would have ideally wanted a calendar where I could play the first ISL game against FC Pune City, have a break and then go to the national team for a week. It's not nice that we are not going to play the first two (ISL) games. I want to play for the country, make no mistake about it. But we have to have a good calendar where games have to be fitted in accordance with the national team so that we can be available for both the tournaments."
